poll_list.title: Ratification Poll for Onboard/Amend Keeper Network - Tech-Ops (MIP63c4-SP1) - February 14, 2022

content.content: MIP63c4: Onboard/Amend Keeper Network  Preamble MIP63c4#: SP1 Title: Onboard/Amend Keeper Network - Tech-Ops Author(s): Sam MacPherson (@hexonaut) Contributors: Tags: keeper-network Status: Accepted Date Proposed: 2022-01-19 Date Ratified: 2022-02-28   Specification   Name: Tech-Ops  Short Name: MAKER  Website: N/A  Requested Budget: 0 DAI / day  Requested Buffer Min: N/A  Requested Buffer Max: N/A  Chain: All  Address to Stream DAI to: N/A   Network Description This is an onboarding application for the tech-ops internal core unit. Tech-ops receives a budget external to this proposal, so none is required here. They are already maintaining all keeper operations, so this is a formality of switching to this new standardized Keeper Network system.  Expected Coverage  ALL
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal titled "MIP63c4-SP1: Onboard/Amend Keeper Network - Tech-Ops" authored by Sam MacPherson. The proposal is an onboarding application for the tech-ops internal core unit, which is already maintaining all keeper operations. The proposal does not require any budget as the unit receives external funding. The post does not contain any negative feedback or criticism of the proposal.
